name: Korean Memorizer - learn to write and read Hangul
description: Learn Korean the easy way! Read, write and listen!   Totally free   Writing animation - watch and learn the stroke orders  Human pronunciation - hear how the characters are pronounced  Hangul writing practice - practice your writing right in the app  Easy-to-use  Flash cards  Romanization: allows those who cant read Korean hangul to phonetically pronounce it  Helps your memory  Works offline  Less than 5 minutes per day   Korean Hangul - Dont hesitate to contact us to give your suggestion and ideas. Thank you for your support!  Oh, and I already told you that the Korean Memorizer is totally free!? :D
